full_text: Page 1836 >>> NYM/Exec Assistant~ 8/12/2019 2:20 PM >>> >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @buzzfeed.com> 8/12/2019 2:13 PM >>> Hello (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out on a story regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death. We have found a series of posts that were made on the website 4chan prior to any public announcement of Epstein's death. The first post was made at 8:15 AM and the subsequent posts described in detail the first responders' actions. The first news report about Epstein's death was at roughly 9 AM. I've pasted one of the posts below: Anonymous ID:rPtND1Si Sat 10 Aug 2019 08:47:56 No.222520442 Quoted By: >>222520675 >>222520785 >>222521102 >>222521684 >>222522176 >>222524005 >>222524197 >>222524420 >>222524649 >>222527632 >>222519952 worked asystole arrest for 40 minutes, als intubated in the field/epi/2 liters NS infused. Telemetry advised bicarb and D50 in field. Pt transported to Lower Manhattan ER and worked for 20 minutes and called. Hospital administrator was alerted, preparing statements Can you verify the accuracy of what's been posted? Would speaking publicly about an inmate's death break any procedures? If so, does MCC plan to take any action on the matter or investigate it? Please get back to me as soon as possible today. Thank you, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) -- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) eLytv | Reporter | BuzzFeed News PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com Page 9870

text_blocks.content: I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out on a story regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death. We have found a series of posts that were made on the website 4chan prior to any public announcement of Epstein's death. The first post was made at 8:15 AM and the subsequent posts described in detail the first responders' actions. The first news report about Epstein's death was at roughly 9 AM.

Anonymous ID:rPtND1Si Sat 10 Aug 2019 08:47:56 No.222520442 Quoted By: >>222520675 >>222520785 >>222521102 >>222521684 >>222522176 >>222524005 >>222524197 >>222524420 >>222524649 >>222527632 >>222519952 worked asystole arrest for 40 minutes, als intubated in the field/epi/2 liters NS infused. Telemetry advised bicarb and D50 in field. Pt transported to Lower Manhattan ER and worked for 20 minutes and called. Hospital administrator was alerted, preparing statements

Can you verify the accuracy of what's been posted? Would speaking publicly about an inmate's death break any procedures? If so, does MCC plan to take any action on the matter or investigate it? Please get back to me as soon as possible today.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) eLytv | Reporter | BuzzFeed News PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email from a BuzzFeed News reporter to an executive assistant at NYM, regarding a story about Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email includes a post from 4chan and asks the recipient to verify the accuracy of the post and inform about any planned actions or investigations by MCC. The document has redactions in the form of (b)(6); (b)(7)(C).
